reviews.review: Игра очень крутая,особенно если играть с друзьями.Всем советую эту игру.

Максимально убогие хитбоксы, постоянные ошибки и вылеты, графика как в gta sa, а ресурсов жрет много. Игра еще актуальна только потому что нет никакой альтернативы. Ужасно разочарован. БЛЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯЯ СКОЛЬКО МОЖНО ВЫЛЕТАТь стабильный интернет, никаких проблем в других играх, а в этой постоянные ошибки, вылеты дисконекты за которые тебе дают временный бан пиздец спасибо. Я ругаю то, что люблю, какого хуя в игре столько ошибок. Новый ман пиздец олицевторение ущербности, как такую хуйету можно было придумать
Great game to get, especially if you watched the killers horror movies in the game makes you appreciate the game much more. 5 stars!

Tis the best game, the only game

After 1300+ hours on the game, I just can't take the lack of quality in the development. The game remains unbalanced after all this time - and you could say that it's balanced enough to play. Maybe. But add to that it takes 5-10 minutes to play a match, and then you deal with 20-30 game-impacting bugs while playing those matches. There's a reason for it's decline on steamcharts, and I'm happy to finally wake up to it myself and uninstall.

I still managed to play 140 hours...

Fix Blights bugs and then I'll reconsider my stance.

Edit: It's been half a year and he's only gotten buggier.

This game will make you wonder what you were doing all your life, or it will make you question your existence. The only way to win is to not have fun, and the only way to have fun is to lose, it is either or.

This is currently my game of choice. I love the thrill of playing both sides, really get's the blood pumping. If you're heart isn't beating considerably faster than it was before you started a match, you're probably doing something wrong. Unlike most other multiplayer games, Dead by Daylight is enjoyable whether you're in the mood to play with others or alone. I recommend this game to everyone who enjoys horror games and movies since it includes multiple familiar names and faces. The only reason I wouldn't recommend this game would be that occasionally, depending on what time of day you are playing, the matchmaking can take quite a while. But, if you're patient, I'm sure you'll definitely love this game!

A scary one with a very cool effects and graphics! i really recommend this game specially if you play it with your friends!

I loved playing this game, but cannot recommend it due to consistent bugs. The matchmaking times are ridiculous, sometimes over 15 minutes for a game. Friends and I get randomly disconnected from games, and then I get banned for disconnecting... I get stuck in objects every time I play. Or just now, game stopped recognizing my controller, so I had to disconnect and now I'm banned. Devs don't know what they're doing. I have about 300hours in at this point, but I'd say a third of it has just been time wasted on these bugs.

1) Это сырой продукт полный багов
2) Баланс на стороне Маньяков (особенно после добавления Мора с перком Не смерть)
3) Выжившие банально не сбегают из-за дизбаланса (это не норма когда Маньяк берёт Memento mori и (дизбаланснутые ) Радужные улучшения (к способностям)
4) Новых Маньяков делают специально сильными (по сравнению со старыми) что-бы все покупали новые DLC (как по мне это не справедливо)
5) Игра всё менее и менее становится оптимизированным "продуктом"
6) Разработчикам ПЛЕВАТЬ на своё Комьюнити (не делают о чём просят (к примеру не фиксят баги и хитбоксы) ; !НЕ БАНЯТ ЧИТЕРОВ! ; Ну и продолжают дизбалансить игру фикся перки Выживших и не трогая перки Маньяков

This game is amazing. High replay value and if with frends, you will be able to mak strategies to ensure fn rounds for hours of fun.

Great game! (When played properly)

The devs seem to keep pushing further and further to the killer's side. No longer can players just leave a match because of killers trolling or camping the hooks that a survivor gets put on when caught. If they do, they face a 15 minute ban period where you can't enter another match. This affects all members of your party as well. Yet the devs have done NOTHING to prevent the killers from camping; no temporary safe bubble around the hook, no reveal of hunter when within a certain radius, nothing. It seems a small thing to write about, but when that is the entire objective for the killer, it really does tell you that it breaks the game for all of the survivors. If you play this properly in a private game with friends, it can be one of the most fun things you've done in a while, but to be honest, public matches are just not even worth playing anymore. 

DEVELOPERS IF YOU SEE THIS:
please Please PLEASE implement something that allows survivors the ability to unhook their teammates without the worry of a camping killer, or remove the matchmaking lock time. If the killer is abusing the game and the match, they deserve people leaving. I'd rather have random rage quitters but the ability to find a good game, than be locked out of the good matches for suffering through an atrociously awful one.

Too Long, Didn't Read:
Don't buy it until they fix the problem of killers camping and abusing, and the survivors suffering for it. It's not worth it, and it's truly one of the worst games ever until then.

Впринципе, игра огонь, но брать за полную сумму не стоит, потомучто 
1) Игра может показатся с первого взглада отстоем, и вы просто не влсприймете эту игру
2) Если у вас нет друзей играющих в ДБД, то не бирите, вам попросту будет скучно играть самому, с друзьями будет лучше адаптироватся под игру
3)Кому не нравится жанр игр Хоррор, тем вооще игра не зайдет, и покажется говном

И так, итоги:
Игра хороша, в том случае, если есть друзья с ДБД. Но я не рекамендую брать игру изза 1) Сложного интерфейса(попросту новичёк не разберется в нем). 2) Однотипные карты. 3) Нет разнообразия(Например: разных квестов, всяких ловушек, или пугающих скримеров.)
4) Много не нужных скинов.
Отличная игра, если у вас есть друзья :)
